Text:
Thanks again for this, superfast download as well!

Regarding Bara Flokkurrin: yeah, they were strangely good for an unknwon village punk band. I couldn't recommend too many groups like them that you haven't already heard of. 

If you haven't already heard them then I recommend Peyr (Bowie meets Killing Joke meets Devo)

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4961763/_eyr_(Theyr)_discography_-_Icelandic_new_wave_punk

Most people think they should've made a bigger impact on a world scene for being so innovative. Check out "As Above", "Fourth Reich", and "Lunaire" particularly. Tah
Time to buy another hard drive! Thanks 80zforever!

@JettBlack9: I have Feeling Cavalier and should get around to uploading it before TPB ship goes down. It's an 80s gem.
